Subjects: sermons; Corpus Christi, feast of; miracles
_description: Homily on the Feast of Corpus Christi, with several miracles, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle—in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ȜE lewede Men takeþ hedeffor þeos clerkes haþ
                    non nede…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In nomine patris wiþ ou goEt spiritus sancti do also.
                    Amen.

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULDd11.First Lines:
ȜE lewede men takeþ hedeffor þeos clerkes haþ
                    non nede…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…In nomine patris & filii wiþ vs goEt spiritus sancti
                    do also
CULDd11.Note:
Preceded by a unique Prologue for a total of 674 lines; missing folios
                    34-36.
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
In nomine summi saluatoris gloriosissimi sub limis creatoris indiuidue
                        omnipotentis ineffabilis trinitatis incomprehensibilis & incommutabilis
                        veri dei & hominis nostri principii progreditur exordium veri vbi
                        cristus est fundamentum; nullum boni operis superest edificium patebunt
                        lingua materna dei mediante gratia. Panem angelorum manducauit homo. Dauid
                        in psalmo (f. 32v)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Laude men herto tak hedeffor vnto clerkes it es no nede…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat we may with þat pardon lendIn life þat lastes with owten end
BLHar4196.Note: 664 lines. Preceded by Latin, “Panem angelorum manducauit homo.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Sermo in festo corporis cristi (rubric, f. 100vb)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
…I wone with hym & and he with meTo lyue for hym & he
                    for me…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…In nomine patrus with on goEt spiritus sancti do also.
                    Amen
